definition[0]: to deliberately not breathe out for a short time
example[0]: Hold your breath and count to ten.
definition[1]: to not breathe out and try not to make a sound because you do not want to be noticed
example[1]: Julie shrank back against the wall and held her breath.
definition[2]: used to say that you do not expect something to happen, even though someone has said it will
example[2]: He promised he’d phone, but I’m not holding my breath.
